uvi.description:
net: mdiobus: Fix memory leak in __mdiobus_register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15 by commit ab609f25d19858513919369ff3d9a63c02cd9e2e. For more details please see the references link.
